title: Champion of Poseidon
name: Javelantis - Champion of Poseidon
printed_effect:
When you Cast Tsunami you can Special Ascend
this Javelantis in your hand from 1 of your {water}
Elestrals. Your {water}-Enchanted Elestrals deal
Piercing damage while Poseidon is Enchanted.
effect: When you Cast Tsunami you can Special Ascend this Javelantis in your hand from one of your {water} Elestrals. Your {water}-Enchanted Elestrals deal Piercing damage while Poseidon is Enchanted.
